message: Going to re-post this in its own topic, per the suggestion of my better half.  Splee and I will be in Victoria on the weekend of the 15th if anyone wants to meet up.  I'm jealous that I missed the 2007 trip, blah blah.  Let's get drunk!
Bah for a moment I thought you meant Victoria, the state, here.
=(  Sorry DL.  Someday we'll definitely be heading your way, and we'll give you a heads up.  It's a really really long flight though.  20 hours with connection.
NY is next on our list!
NY is definitely the place to be
So I'm thinking we might come out to NY for Labor Day weekend in September.  Is everyone going to be around?
I live here, So i will be. Not sure where drizzy will be.
So we're headed to Victoria in 4 days.  PM me or Splee for phone numbers in case you want to hang.
Erik and I will be getting muddy and sweaty this weekend or we'd join you :)
I'll be in NY for Labor day I think
Not sure if we'll be going on Labor day now.  I have a friend who moved to NY from the UK and we'd like to meet up but he's out of town when we planned to be there.
What a dick!  How dare he have a life and ruin our plans.  I am mad at him.
